channel.title: Need help with looting impling jars

item.title: Need help with looting impling jars
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Bubbsy7, post:1, topic:481293”]Ok so I put this code in itempackethandler.java under ItemSelect

case 11238: player.getInventory().deleteItem(11238, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(995, 7500); player.sm("You looted the impling jar!"); break;

And nothing happens when you click on the imp jar. What am I doing wrong?[/quote]
Don’t they have a click item packet you could be implementing?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with looting impling jars

item.title: Need help with looting impling jars
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

RSPS222:

i have only 1 idea but i dont think thats the problem, maybe the case is already in use

If the case was already in use, it would throw a “duplicate case” error.

Are you sure you have the right case number, and am using it in the right place?

Read full topic

item.description:
@Bubbsy7 wrote:

case 10835: player.getInventory().deleteItem(10835, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(995, 1000000000); player.sm("<col=cd0000>You recieve 1b GP from the Tax Bag!"); break;

I put it right under that, and that code works fine…
